name: get_reply_comment_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_video_no_watermark_v2.
Tool description: The API helps you to download and get the video download link without the Tiktok logo quickly, completely and in detail. Contact me: phamvandienofficial@gmail.com if you are interested in the source code
***
If you encounter any errors, please contact me so I can fix it quickly.
***
Contact me: phamvandienofficial@gmail.com
API description: Fetch a list of reply comments from TikTok for a given comment and video ID.

cid.description: The ID of the comment for which to fetch reply comments.

aweme_id.description: The ID of the TikTok video associated with the comment.

count.description: The number of reply comments to retrieve, with a maximum value of 30. Default is 5.

cursor.description: The cursor position for paginating through the comments. Default is 0.
